name: RyanBaka Bot
description: A modular Telegram bot with AI, Economy, and Management features.

MONGO_URL.description: Your MongoDB Connection URL (from MongoDB Atlas)

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram User ID (integer) for sudo commands

LOG_CHANNEL_ID.description: Channel ID for logs (Must start with -100). Make sure bot is Admin there.

GIT_TOKEN.description: GitHub Token for the AI Chatbot features

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API Key (Found in Account Settings) for the /logs command

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The exact name of this Heroku App (e.g., ryan-baka-bot-123)
